name: DVS
description:
Established in 2001, our 100+ seat contact centre boasts state of the art technology in both telephony and computer systems. Our office space is friendly and welcoming, based in St. Leonards on Sea, on the South coast of East Sussex and presents magnificent views of Beachy Head. Our management team have many years experience in contact centre management, publishing and the newspaper industry enabling us to deliver a variety of solutions to best suit our client's needs.
With over 10 years of experience in carrying out In and Outbound calls to businesses and/or consumers, ranging from fronting customer help lines, managing subscription sales and renewals, undertaking market research or carrying out customer service related calls, DVS offers a competitive and reliable service.
